coreAtributes.name: torn punk t-shirt
coreAtributes.description: A punk shirt torn so that the wearer's midrift is revealed.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your torn T-shirt.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s torn T-shirt and roughly pull it off over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your torn T-shirt and roughly pulls it off over your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s torn T-shirt and roughly pulls it off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on the torn T-shirt.
replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.arms] through the torn T-shirt's sleeves as you pull it on [npc.herHim].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the torn T-shirt down over [npc.her] head, before pulling it down over [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your [pc.arms] through the torn T-shirt's sleeves, before pulling it down over your torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the torn T-shirt down over your head, before pushing your [pc.arms] through the sleeves.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name]'s [npc2.arms] through the torn T-shirt's sleeves before pulling it down over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the torn T-shirt down over [npc2.her] head, before pulling it down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull your torn T-shirt up to just below your chin.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You roughly yank up [npc.name]'s torn T-shirt.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] torn T-shirt up to just below [npc.her] chin.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] roughly yanks up your torn T-shirt.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull your torn T-shirt back down, covering your torso.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] torn T-shirt back down to cover [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] roughly pulls down your torn T-shirt.
